A

appearances - package appearances
Any class that has to do with changing the visual appearance of geometry goes here.

An axis frame is a 3D shape.

Contains a bunch of behaviours.

F

forward - Variable in class behaviours.FreeCamController
Unit vectors for the directions of the camera
FreeCamController - Class in behaviours
Allows the moving and rotating of a ViewTransform, AKA a camera.
FreeCamController(BasicView) - Constructor for class behaviours.FreeCamController
The one and only constructor, pass in the BasicView or some other subclass for it to control.
